text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump November 2019. That's how early you knew of the coming coronavirus pandemic. That's when you knew and ignored the advice of the soulless cowards who lick your boots every fucking day. You made light of it when you could have prepared. You are a fucking disaster. #VoteThemAllOut
